title: An Act relative to supporting veterans organizations

abstracts.abstract: By Representatives Badger of Plymouth and LaNatra of Kingston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 480) of Michelle L. Badger relative to authorizing video gaming activities and certain veterans organizations.  Economic Development and Emerging Technologies.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies

related_entities.name: committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/13/2025 from 11:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 11/13/2025 from 11:00 AM-02:00 PM in A-2                                                                                                                                                                         and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Reporting date extended to Monday, March 16, 2026
